data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Gnjilane, Kosovo to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gnjilane, Kosovo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 352 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 513 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Gnjilane to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Gnjilane who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Gorani people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Gnjilane do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Gnjilane against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Gnjilane, Kosovo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
